description: This table contains the currently active medication administration data. This includes all scheduled and acted upon administrations currently showing on the MAR.

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication order.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the item.

columns.name: TAKEN_TIME
columns.description: The user-specified time that the action took place.

columns.name: MAR_ORIG_DUE_TM
columns.description: The original due time for the administration.

columns.name: SCHEDULED_TIME
columns.description: The scheduled time on the MAR.

columns.name: SAVED_TIME
columns.description: The instant the medication administration was saved.

columns.name: MAR_SCHD_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the original due time was created by the scheduler.  This item is not populated for data saved by a user, including user-created due times.

columns.name: MAR_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The MAR action category number associated with this administration.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Given


Missed


Refused


Canceled Entry


Held


New Bag


Restarted


Stopped


Rate Change


MAR Hold


MAR Unhold


Bolus


Push


Rate Verify


See Alternative


Paused


Pending


Automatically Held


Due

columns.name: MAR_UNIT_NUM
columns.description: The blood unit number associated with this administration.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user that took action on the administration.

columns.name: SEC_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the secondary user associated with this administration.

columns.name: MAR_DOC_USER_ID
columns.description: User (EMP) ID of the user who documented the med administration. This item is null unless the administering user (ORD 11110) is different than the documenting user.

columns.name: SIG
columns.description: The dose value of the administration.

columns.name: ROUTE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The route category number associated with this administration.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: The comment associated with the administration.

columns.name: REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of the reason that is given for documenting a certain action. A reason is generally required for the actions of Missed and MAR Hold, but can be configured for any action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SITE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The site category number used for the administration.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Right Arm


Left Arm


Right Quadriceps


Left Quadriceps


Right Upper Outer Quadrant


Left Upper Outer Quadrant


Abdominal Tissue


Port

columns.name: INFUSION_RATE
columns.description: The rate at which the medication was infused.

columns.name: MAR_INF_RATE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The unit category number associated with the infusion rate of the administration.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The unit category number associated with the dose of the administration.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAR_INF_RATE_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: MAR_DURATION
columns.description: The length of time the administration took to complete or infuse.

columns.name: MAR_DURATION_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The duration unit category number associated with the administration.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Minutes


Hours


Days

columns.name: DEV_RECV_TIME
columns.description: The instant the device recorded this administration data.

columns.name: MAR_IMM_LINK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the immunization associated with this administration.

columns.name: OVRD_LINK_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The linked override pull status category number of the administration, indicating whether it is linked to a medication order. The status can be 1-"linked", 2-"not linked", or null.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Linked


Not linked

columns.name: MAR_OVRD_LNK_USR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user that updated the linked status of the override pull administration.

columns.name: MAR_ADMIN_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department associated with this administration. A department is associated with an administration by checking the following locations in this order: the order's dispensing department, the order's routing department, and the patient's location at the time of the administration.

columns.name: MAR_ORD_DAT
columns.description: The order contact for this administration.

columns.name: SCAN_MODE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the user scanned at least one barcode for this admin. This column should not be used to report on scanning compliance.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DUE_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The medication administration record (MAR) action that is scheduled when a due time is acted upon.  This column will only be populated if Duration-Based Due Actions are configured (LSD 34640 and 34641).


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAR_ACTION_C_NAME

columns.name: MAR_BILLING_PROV_ID
columns.description: This stores the 'billing provider' for a given administration.

columns.name: MED_OVRIDE_ALERT_ID
columns.description: This column will list the overridden "Med not scanned" alert ID for an administration

columns.name: PAT_OVRIDE_ALERT_ID
columns.description: This column will list the overridden "Patient not scanned" alert ID for an administration

columns.name: MAR_BLOOD_INFO_LN
columns.description: The line number for the blood unit information associated with this administration. Together with ORDER_MED_ID, this forms the foreign key to the BLOOD_ADMIN_INFO table.

columns.name: CYCLIC_RATE_PARENT_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the parent administration of this cyclic rate change due time.

columns.name: MORPHINE_EQUIV_MG_DOSE
columns.description: This column stores a non-rate-based or non-continuous medication administration's equivalent dose in terms of milligrams of morphine. This value represents the relative amount of opiates a patient received from the administration. For medications which do not contain an opioid as defined in System Definitions, this value is 0. For continuous opioids and opioids with a rate-based dose, this value is null. Patches are considered to have a rate-based dose for this column. This is not calculated for blood product, feeding product, or patient-controlled analgesic (PCA) administrations.

columns.name: MORPHINE_EQUIV_MG_PER_HR_RATE
columns.description: This column stores a rate-based or continuous medication administration's equivalent dose rate in terms of milligrams of morphine infused per hour. This value represents the relative amount of opiates a patient received over the duration of the administration. For medications which do not contain an opioid as defined in system definitions, this value will be zero. For non-continuous opioids and opioids with a non-rate-based dose, this value will be null. Patches are considered to have a rated-based dose for this column. This item is not calculated for blood product, feeding product, or patient-controlled analgesic (PCA) administrations.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_AMOUNT
columns.description: In workflows where weight-based dose simplification or unit conversion can happen, this column contains the originally documented amount.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the originally documented unit if dose simplification or unit conversion occurred.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAR_INF_RATE_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: MAR_ORD_CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The ORD contact date for this administration in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CUP_IDENT
columns.description: This is the ID that dictates which cup an administration belongs to.

columns.name: SCHEDULED_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The scheduled dose unit category ID for the administration.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAR_INF_RATE_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: SCHEDULED_DOSE
columns.description: The dose that was scheduled to be due for the administration of an order with multiple possible doses.

columns.name: CONCENTRATION
columns.description: The concentration for the administration.

columns.name: DUR_BASED_PARENT_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the administration that created this duration-based due time.

columns.name: DUR_BASED_CHILD_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the duration-based due time administration that was created by this administration.

columns.name: CYCLIC_RATE_CHILD_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the following child administration of this cyclic rate change due time.

columns.name: SCHEDULED_AMOUNT
columns.description: Scheduled administration amount when the order has multiple doses.

columns.name: SCHEDULED_AMOUNT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Scheduled administration amount unit when the order has multiple doses.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MAR_INF_RATE_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: CUP_OVRIDE_ALERT_ID
columns.description: This item will list the overridden "Container not scanned" alert for an administration.
